Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue/East Ulandia
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Goldenrod Avenue and East Ulandia.
Room.LongDescription: Goldenrod Avenue is to the east. Directly west is the banks of the Baldywyne, a fast moving river which flows from the mysterious heights of Mount Caledonia. There is a boat rental for those interested in seeing the river first-hand. A small sword shoppe, with glittering blades on display, is next door.
